img_summary: The image depicts a large, menacing creature named "Fuban" standing in a desert-like environment. The creature has a crustacean-like appearance with a hard shell, sharp claws, and multiple limbs. In the background, there is a structure resembling a pagoda and a statue, suggesting an ancient or mystical setting. The sky is partly cloudy, and the atmosphere is dusty, adding to the dramatic scene. Chinese characters are visible on the right side of the image, possibly indicating the name or title related to the creature or the location.
